orbs_n_stuff.config.orbOwnerTime.desc: How long in ticks a dropped orb can only be picked up by the direct killer of the entity that dropped it.
orbs_n_stuff.config.orbDespawnTime.desc:
How long in ticks until an orb despawns. Default is the same as an item.

Set to -1 to disable despawning (not recommended on a server).
orbs_n_stuff.config.hpSettings.hpDropCha: Fractional chance with 1.0 being 100% that an HP Orb drops on kill
orbs_n_stuff.config.hpSettings.lowHpChan: Whether being low on HP boosts the chance of an orb dropping by 2x; 4x if at 1hp
Fraction of player health below which HP orb chance is boosting 2x. Below 1hp (5%) will be boosted 4x as long as boosting is enabled.
orbs_n_stuff.config.hpSettings.lootingCh: Additional drop chance per level of looting
orbs_n_stuff.config.hpSettings.hpBlackli: Mobs in this list won't drop HP orbs. Takes precedence over the whitelist.
orbs_n_stuff.config.hpSettings.hpWhiteli: Mobs in this list will drop HP orbs if they wouldn't otherwise, and they aren't in the blacklist.
orbs_n_stuff.config.xpSettings.xpDropCha: Fractional chance with 1.0 being 100% that an HP Orb drops on kill
orbs_n_stuff.config.xpSettings.uniqueKil: Whether killing mobs not killed often before boosts drop chance up to 2x
orbs_n_stuff.config.xpSettings.lootingCh: Additional drop chance per level of looting
orbs_n_stuff.config.xpSettings.xpBlackli: Mobs in this list won't drop XP orbs. Takes precedence over the whitelist.
orbs_n_stuff.config.xpSettings.xpWhiteli: Mobs in this list will drop XP orbs if they wouldn't otherwise, and they aren't in the blacklist.
orbs_n_stuff.config.statusSettings.statu: Fractional chance with 1.0 being 100% that an HP Orb drops on kill
Advancements the player needs to have completed before status effect orbs start dropping for them.
orbs_n_stuff.config.statusSettings.kille: Whether status orb drop chance is increased for every status the killed mob had.
orbs_n_stuff.config.statusSettings.perSt: Whether status orb drop chance is increased for every status the killed mob had.
orbs_n_stuff.config.statusSettings.looti: Additional drop chance per level of looting
orbs_n_stuff.config.statusSettings.statu: Mobs in this list won't drop Status Effect orbs. Takes precedence over the whitelist.
Mobs in this list will drop Status Effect orbs if they wouldn't otherwise, and they aren't in the blacklist.
orbs_n_stuff.config.bossSettings.desc: Dropped when the player kills bosses, usually for the first time only
orbs_n_stuff.config.bossSettings.bossKil: How many times the player can have killed a boss for this orb to drop. Default is 1: it will only drop on the first kill of the boss.
Map of bosses to specific max kill count allowed for them. Default is 1: it will only drop on the first kill of the boss.
orbs_n_stuff.config.bossSettings.bossBla: Mobs in this list won't drop orbs of accomplishment. Takes precedence over the whitelist.
orbs_n_stuff.config.bossSettings.bossWhi:
Mobs in this list will drop orbs of accomplishment if they wouldn't otherwise, and they aren't in the blacklist.

This will apply to non-boss mobs added to this list.
orbs_n_stuff.config.clientSettings.showO: Particle count must be greater than 0
orbs_n_stuff.config.clientSettings.beamH: Height in blocks of the particle beam
orbs_n_stuff.config.clientSettings.beamO: Distance in blocks of the base of the particle beam from the bottom of the orb
orbs_n_stuff.config.clientSettings.parti: How many loot beam particles to spawn per tick
orbs_n_stuff.config.clientSettings.rende:
Multiplier that determines how much farther or closer than normal the orb entities will stop rendering.

 0.5 will only render half of normal distance, 2.0 twice.
